name: MIRRORED (abababbb)
description:
Controls:

  • Click and drag to create a Mirror.
  • Let go to teleport to the other side, or right click to cancel.
    •  (letting go without moving your mouse will switch dimensions without moving. Most attack patterns can be dodged this way!)
  •  Only objects in the same dimension can interact with each other. 
  • If you survive for long enough, lasers will activate, ramping up the challenge.
  • Try to survive as long as you can!
  • PRACTICE MODE HEAVILY RECOMMENDED!

Music is from https://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

everything else done by me!
